name: cyolo
label: Cyolo
description: Cyolo helps enterprises provide their global workforce with convenient and secure access to applications, resources, workstations, servers, and files, regardless of location or device used.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the Cyolo server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API Key used to access the Cyolo APIs and perform automated operations.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Users List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users from Cyolo

operations.title: Get User Policies
operations.description: Retrieves the list of policies associated with the user based on the user ID provided

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.description: Specify the user ID to retrieve its policies
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get User By ID Or Name
operations.description: Retrieves the user details based on the ID or name provided.

parameters.title: User ID Or Name
parameters.description: Specify the user ID or name to retrieve its details
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Delete User By ID Or Name
operations.description: Deletes the user details based on the ID or name provided.

parameters.title: User ID Or Name
parameters.description: Specify the user ID or name to retrieve its details
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Policy List
operations.description: Retrieves the policy list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Policy By ID Or Name
operations.description: Retrieves the policy details based on the ID or name provided from the Cyolo

parameters.title: Policy ID Or Name
parameters.description: Specify the policy ID or name to retrieve its details
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Simple Group List
operations.description: Retrieves the simple group list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Dynamic Group List
operations.description: Retrieves the dynamic group list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Constraints List
operations.description: Retrieves the constraints list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Capabilities List
operations.description: Retrieves the capabilities list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Mappings List
operations.description: Retrieves the mappings/applications list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Webhooks List
operations.description: Retrieves the webhooks (user-defined HTTP callbacks) list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Device Posture Profiles List
operations.description: Retrieves the device posture profiles (conditions that users' devices must meet in order to access resources.) list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Mapping Categories List
operations.description: Retrieves the mapping categories list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Get Certificates List
operations.description: Retrieves the certificates list from the Cyolo

operations.title: Create Policy
operations.description: Creates a policy in the cyolo based on the parameters provided.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the policy
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Enabled
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether to enable on disable the policy
parameters.description: Specify whether to enable on disable the policy
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.title: Dynamic Groups
parameters.tooltip: Specify the dynamic groups IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple dynamic group IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the dynamic groups IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple dynamic group IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: dynamic_groups

parameters.title: Simple Groups
parameters.tooltip: Specify the simple groups IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple simple group IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the simple groups IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple simple group IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: simple_groups

parameters.title: Mappings/Applications
parameters.tooltip: Specify the mapping/application IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple mapping/application IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the mapping/application IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple mapping/application IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: mappings

parameters.title: Supervisors
parameters.tooltip: Specify the supervisors IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple supervisors IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the supervisors IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple supervisors IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: supervisors

parameters.title: Users
parameters.tooltip: Specify the User IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple user IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the User IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple user IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: users

parameters.title: Webhooks
parameters.tooltip: Specify the webhooks IDs which you want to associate with the policy. You can specify multiple webhooks IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the webhooks IDs which you want to associate with the policy. You can specify multiple webhooks IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: webhooks

parameters.title: Mapping Categories
parameters.tooltip: Specify the mapping category IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple mapping category IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the mapping category IDs which you want to assign to the policy. You can specify multiple mapping category IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: mapping_categories

parameters.title: Enable Time Access
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether you want to enable Timed Access or not
parameters.description: Specify whether you want to enable Timed Access or not
parameters.name: timed_access_status

parameters.title: Start
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start time for the policy to be applicable.
parameters.description: Specify the start time for the policy to be applicable.
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end time for the policy to be applicable.
parameters.description: Specify the end time for the policy to be applicable.
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Days
parameters.tooltip: Specify the days on which the policy will be applicable.
parameters.description: Specify the days on which the policy will be applicable.
parameters.name: days

parameters.title: Trusted Certificates
parameters.tooltip: Specify the trusted certificates IDs which you want to associate with the policy. You can specify multiple trusted certificates IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the trusted certificates IDs which you want to associate with the policy. You can specify multiple trusted certificates IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: trusted_certificates

parameters.title: Device Posture Profiles
parameters.tooltip: Specify the device posture profiles IDs which you want to associate with the policy. You can specify multiple device posture profiles IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the device posture profiles IDs which you want to associate with the policy. You can specify multiple device posture profiles IDs as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: device_posture_profiles

parameters.title: Capabilities
parameters.name: capabilities

parameters.title: Constraints
parameters.name: constraints
